author: parithosh
content:
We have Pectra-msf-1 live now! https://dora.pectra-msf-1.ethpandaops.io/

it uses all the latest mainnet releases from the client teams. There were two minor bugs found (related to shadowfork configs), both have since been fixed. We're at ~97% participation rate now, and we are still importing transactions from mainnet. We will do a round of deposit and other tests tomorrow before tearing down the network. Let us know if there's a specific test someone wants us to perform.

the ssh credentials and urls are the same as always ðŸ™‚

author: terencechain
content:
We are seeing prysm proposers failing block proposals since it could not agree on the canonical correct deposit count:
```
time="2025-04-28 18:10:34" level=error msg="Rebuilt deposit trie is invalid" error="wanted the canonical count of 0 but received 1787001" prefix="rpc/validator"
```
Curious how other CLs deal with this. Whether it's a setup issue or something else. cc <@491624610215886849>

author: pawandhananjay
content: aren't we supposed to include deposits with invalid signatures as well in the beacon block and just not add them to the registry if the sig is invalid?

author: pawandhananjay
content: sorry its been a while since i looked at the old mechanism so still trying to wrap my head around it

author: nflaig
content:
geth seems to have issues?
```
-28 18:39:00.783[network]         error: Error receiving block slot=640, peer=16Uiu2HAkyoq6d8Pn8PkK6PkfYaKV1E8jzGzRPKo21sHx2E7VQTLH, code=BLOCK_ERROR_EXECUTION_ERROR, execStatus=ELERROR, errorMessage=JSON RPC error: Unsupported fork, engine_newPayloadV4
Error: BLOCK_ERROR_EXECUTION_ERROR
```
also received blcok without execution requests
```
Apr-28 18:41:12.495[api]              warn: Engine failed to produce the block slot=651, fork=electra, builderSelection=executiononly, isBuilderEnabled=false, isEngineEnabled=true, strictFeeRecipientCheck=false, builderBoostFactor=0, durationMs=419 - Missing executionRequests response from getPayload at fork=electra
Error: Missing executionRequests response from getPayload at fork=electra
```
at least `lodestar-geth-1` and other `x-geth-1` seems to have bunch of issues

author: parithosh
content: Yeah we had a issue early on in the network where geth didn't recognize the --override.prague flag. That's now been patched, notice the log you shared was at slot ~640.
